screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .pstemplate file in Corel Pinnacle Studio 26
screenshot.caption: PSTEMPLATE file open in Corel Pinnacle Studio 26

description: Pinnacle Studio is a video editor for Windows that provides various features for editing videos, such as home movies and slideshows. As you edit a project with the software, you can save the progress in the default AXP file format is the default format.

However, if you want to create multiple video projects with the same settings, you can save the project as a PSTEMPLATE file. When saving the file, the template stores placeholders for the media (imported videos, audio, and images) where users can insert other media. To save a project as a PSTEMPLATE, select File â†’ Save Movie As Template .
